name: static-marks
title: Static Marks - Bookmark Search
description: Search and launch websites from your Static Marks bookmark YAML file.
author: aerobless

preferences.name: static-mark-yaml-url
preferences.description: The absolute path to your Static Marks YAML file or folder containing multiple YAML files, or a public URL to a single YAML file
preferences.title: Static Marks YAML File or Folder

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
